1.content: Pick Amy Rose or Rouge to inflate. Then the next chapter will be up to you. So have fun.

1112.content: How does Amy get a bigger butt?
1112.title: How does it happen?

1113.content:
Amy failed to convince Sonic for the 20th time in a row. She tried everything she thoguht of, but then she thought of inflating her breast and butt. She went to the store. She found a special deal says "5 for $10" so she bought 5. She arrived home at 6:35 and ate supper until 7:00. Then she had a choice of having dessert or inflate right here and now.

What would you pick if you were her?
1113.title: Body Inflation

11131.content:
Amy decide to inflate first then have dessert. She put the hose through her mouth and started the hose. She began to think how sonic will respond when he seen her. When she looked at her breast, she was shoked it was her body instead of her breast only. She hatched an idea to make her looked pregnant. But as she began to plan it, it was too late to deflate to make the plan work.

Now it's your turn to decide for her to continue or to stop
11131.title: She decide Inflate

111311.content: She began to feel light and saw that she is floating because she forgot to read at the store and it said it's helium. So she decide just to continue even with helium. She want to become the world's largest blimp for Sonic. She was at 15x15 when her tank ran out. She continue until after the fourth tank ran out. She was outside, tied to a tree to keep her a float. She was at 100x100 and everyone was there. The only person wasn't there was Sonic and then...
111311.title: Continue

choices: " I want to break that record very soon"
1113111.content: She began the last tank before make it offically the world's largest blimp or balloon. When the tank was half empty, Sonic was seen in the crowd and Amy wanted to get down and talk to him, but a record is a record. When the tank was out, it was offical, Amy Rose became the World's Largest Balloon (what? I'm a flip-flopper). Tails gave her the plaque and Amy said...?
1113111.title: She starts the fifth tank

11131111.content: "I want to beat that record by 10 tanks." So Sonic dashed to the store and got the 2 sales just in time before it closed. The next day, and everyone, even Sonic and Tails, was there. Soon after 6 tanks, she continues from 100x100 to 500x500, now that's big, but then she heard ripping in her clothes. She then stopped after 9 tanks. she began to think, "Is this too far or not enough?"
11131111.title: " I want to break that record very soon"

111311112.content:
She decide with or without clothes, she still want to break a record. so she ordered the last tank to be used. Halfway into it, her clothes ripped. After the last tank empty out, she announce of ending of inflating herself for good because she ripped her clothes. 5:30 P.M., is when she completely deflated and got the plaque. She went in and went in to sleep. The next morning the headlines is Amy Retires from Inflation. She was still happy from the picture that sonic Ride her for 5 tanks filling. She asked him out but he said no. Amy said, "you read the paper, did you?" he said yes. sonic said he like her as a friend not girlfriend. So amy decide to accept defeat of dating him.

THE END
111311112.title: One More

1141.content: Ah, breast expansion: An old one, but a good one! So how does Amy get herself a bigger pair of boobs?
1141.title: BE #1.

1143.content: What else do you want?
1143.title: Still going...

11433.content: Alright, how about Amy stuffing her belly with as much food as she can imagine?
11433.title: Something else.

choices: attempt to resist the urge and bring the amulet to Tails.
114331.content:
Amy was walking along the shore of a beach, wearing a solid red bikini. No one was around, and she was complete alone to herself, that was until she looks up and notices Rouge flying overhead. Rouge was returning to her cave after a successful job of stealing things. One of those items she took was the Hunger Amulet, which she had shoved in between her large cleavage, only, not very far, as it slowly but surely fell out due to all the jiggling during her flight. Rouge was unaware of this as the amulet comes crashing down to earth, landing on the beach, only a few feet away from Amy. Rouge flies off behind a mountain and isn't seen again. Meanwhile, Amy walks over to the amulet and observes it lying in the sand. Confused by the strange artifact, Amy picks it up to observe it better.

Immediately upon contact with the Hunger Amulet, it applies its spells, powers, and effects onto Amy. These effects include an infinite hunger, the ability to constantly eat, allowing her belly to grow and stretch to limitless sizes, and can even make food appear in front of her on command. There was no limitation to the number of uses.

Taken over by the powers of the amulet, Amy was more starving than she had ever been before, placing her hand on her currently flat belly.

"I'm so hungry... I really wish I had brought some food with me..." Amy said in slight agony. Just then, the amulet glowed a faint greenish-blue as a table appear, filled with dozens among dozens of hamburgers. Amy's eyes widen. She didn't even consider how it appeared, she was only overjoyed by the sight of food.

Before she dashed for the food, she took one second to think about if it was a good idea. She decided to...
114331.title: The start of a very stuffed hedgehog

info.description: Amy Rose want to impress sonic but can't. there is one option, inflate herself. Make you decision for ONLY Amy Rose or Rouge, not BR or SA (Bunnie Rabbot or Sally Acorn).
